entries.title: Merge branch 'main' and update codebase
entries.whats_new: Consolidated main code and updated various parts of the project to improve functionality.
entries.impact: This update refines the overall project stability and performance without disrupting existing features.

entries.title: Improve LLM summarization of breaking changes
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the language model to more accurately identify and summarize breaking changes in commits.
entries.impact: Users will receive clearer summaries of potential disruptions caused by updates, aiding better decision-making.

entries.title: Update changelog manually
entries.whats_new: Added recent changelog entries to document updates and fixes.
entries.impact: Keeps project documentation current, helping users stay informed about recent changes.

entries.title: Adjust the LLM model configuration
entries.whats_new: Modified the settings of the language model used for summarization tasks.
entries.impact: Potentially improves the accuracy and reliability of change summaries provided to users.

entries.title: Fix bugs on save to git method
entries.whats_new: Resolved issues causing failures when saving data to Git repositories.
entries.impact: Increases reliability in saving changes to version control, preventing data loss.

entries.title: Fix bugs on save to git method (again)
entries.whats_new: Repeated fixing for bugs related to saving files to Git, improving stability.
entries.impact: Users can now save changes to Git repositories more reliably without errors.

entries.title: Fix bugs in LLM
entries.whats_new: Resolved issues affecting the language model's performance.
entries.impact: Enhances the accuracy of automated summaries and analysis generated by the LLM.

entries.title: Update main.py script
entries.whats_new: Modified the main Python script for improved execution flow.
entries.impact: Improves the core functionality and stability of the backend process.

entries.title: Fix bug preventing saving to GitHub repository
entries.whats_new: Corrected an issue that blocked saving files directly to GitHub.
entries.impact: Allows users to save updates directly to repositories without errors.

entries.title: Set up cache saving to GitHub API
entries.whats_new: Implemented caching strategy for storing changelog data via GitHub API.
entries.impact: Speeds up data retrieval and reduces redundant API calls, improving user experience.

entries.title: Store cache permanently locally
entries.whats_new: Configured local storage for changelog cache to ensure persistence across sessions.
entries.impact: Provides faster access to changelog data and increases reliability of offline access.

entries.title: Add entry limiting feature
entries.whats_new: Introduced a cap on the number of changelog entries stored or displayed.
entries.impact: Prevents overload of data and ensures the interface remains manageable for users.

entries.title: Keep local cache strategy
entries.whats_new: Maintained the approach of caching changelog data locally for efficiency.
entries.impact: Optimizes performance and reduces dependency on network calls.

entries.title: Update main.py code
entries.whats_new: Further modifications to the main backend script for better functionality.
entries.impact: Enhances backend stability without affecting user experience directly.

entries.title: Update the project's requirements
entries.whats_new: Updated dependencies listed in requirements.txt.
entries.impact: Ensures the system uses the latest compatible packages for improved performance and security.

entries.title: Deploy on Railway platform
entries.whats_new: Successfully deployed backend services on Railway cloud platform.
entries.impact: Makes the system accessible via the cloud, enabling broader user access.

entries.title: Open backend API to users
entries.whats_new: Enabled access to the backend API for external users.
entries.breaking_change: The API is now open for external use, which may expose endpoints previously restricted, requiring security considerations.
entries.impact: External users can now interact with the system programmatically, increasing usability but also requiring proper security measures.

entries.title: Manage interfaces in a dedicated file
entries.whats_new: Consolidated interface definitions into a single file for easier management.
entries.impact: Streamlines code maintenance and ensures consistent data structures across the project.

entries.title: Polish front-end page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the user interface with decorations, loading effects, and cleaned up code.
entries.impact: Provides a more polished and user-friendly interface with smoother loading experience.

entries.title: Add more details to the details page
entries.whats_new: Completed the floating navbar and expanded information display.
entries.impact: User navigation is improved, making details easier to access and view.

entries.title: Changelog detail page implementation
entries.whats_new: Implemented a page for detailed changelog entries; clicking entries now shows detailed logs.
entries.breaking_change: The behavior when clicking an entry has changed to navigate to detailed logs, altering previous static display behavior.
entries.impact: Users can now explore detailed change logs directly, enhancing transparency but altering previous navigation flow.

entries.title: Introduce JSON cache for changelog connection
entries.whats_new: Configured the backend to generate and serve a JSON cache for changelog data.
entries.breaking_change: The API now generates a cache file before serving, which might cause discrepancies if the cache is outdated, and layout/content changes for better presentation.
entries.impact: Allows faster loading of changelogs for users, improving performance but depends on cache freshness.

entries.title: Polish sidebar and layout
entries.whats_new: Refined the sidebar navigation and layout of the overview page.
entries.impact: Provides a cleaner interface for users to browse different sections.

entries.title: Implement front-end layout and navigation
entries.whats_new: Built a sidebar for navigation and a basic interface for browsing changelogs.
entries.breaking_change: A new basic web interface is established, which is different from previous versions, standardizing how users view changelogs.
entries.impact: Users can now visually browse project updates through a web interface, enhancing accessibility for non-technical users.

entries.title: Create a simple front-end webpage
entries.whats_new: Introduced a web page that displays changelog information generated by OpenAI.
entries.breaking_change: The new web interface now auto-generates content and extracts key information including potential breaking changes, replacing previous manual or less integrated systems.
entries.impact: Offers users an easy way to see recent changes and important updates visually, supporting easier understanding.

entries.title: Update LLM and schemas
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the language model to support automatic detection of breaking changes in commits.
entries.breaking_change: The generator now automatically identifies commits that contain breaking changes, changing how impact analysis is performed.
entries.impact: Users benefit from more accurate detection of disruptive updates, improving safety and planning.

entries.title: Second version of LLM, delete cache
entries.whats_new: Deployed a new iteration of the language model, which now outputs entries with date, impact, title, and news without cache data.
entries.impact: Provides more current and directly generated summaries, improving response freshness and clarity.

entries.title: Update git ignore
entries.whats_new: Modified .gitignore to ignore new files or directories.
entries.impact: Prevents accidental commits of unnecessary files, simplifying repository maintenance.

entries.title: Implement basic backend API
entries.whats_new: Laid the foundation for backend API functionalities.
entries.impact: Sets the stage for further backend development without affecting current system.

entries.title: Initialize project
entries.whats_new: Set up project structure and initial configurations.
entries.impact: Provides a starting point for development and collaboration.
